Posts.Content: I had one of those old cassette tape players & went to the library & got "books on tape", which seem to be plentiful. I would get all cozy & put on my headphones & next thing I knew, I was being shook by the nurse to tell me I was finished & it was time to clean up my port. I don't think I ever got through with one side of the cassette or finished a book, but I always had a nice nap.
Posts.Title: Chemo Chicks: What did you do during your chemo treatments?
